author: Madeleine Carlisle
title: Rhode Island Governor Announces National Guard Will Go ‘Door-to-Door’ to Identify New Yorkers to Slow COVID-19 Spread
description: Rhode Island officials will patrol the highways and knock on doors, ordering anyone coming from New York into quarantine.
content: Rhode Island Gov. Gina Raimondo announced during a press conference on Friday that the state would take drastic steps to “pin-point” individuals who had recently traveled to New York in an attempt to stem the spread of COVID-19, the disease caused by the nove… [+2496 chars]
